src: 2022年北京地区高校毕业生预计达26.8万人-新华网
test: 2022 Beijing area college graduates expected to reach 268,000 people - Xinhua News Agency

src: 新华社北京12月11日电（记者阳娜）记者从近日北京市教委、北京市人力资源和社会保障局联合召开的2022届北京高校毕业生就业创业工作视频会议上获悉，2022年北京地区高校毕业生预计达26.8万人，比去年增加1.6万人。
test: BEIJING, Dec. 11 (Xinhua) -- The number of college graduates in Beijing is expected to reach 268,000 this year, up 6 percent year on year, according to a video conference on employment and entrepreneurship for 2022 college graduates held recently by the Beijing Municipal Commission of Education and the Beijing Municipal Human Resources and Social Security Bureau.

src: 北京市人力资源和社会保障局相关负责人表示，将从加强供需匹配、强化政策支持、拓宽就业渠道、确保困难帮扶、支持创新创业、提升服务效能等方面部署北京高校毕业生就业工作。
test: Beijing Municipal Human Resources and Social Security Bureau said that it will focus on strengthening the supply and demand matching, strengthening policy support, expanding employment channels, ensuring difficult help, supporting innovation and entrepreneurship, and improving service efficiency to deploy the employment of Beijing college graduates.

src: 记者了解到，北京市人力资源和社会保障局将搭建实践平台，加大岗位供给，主动联系40家高校毕业生职场体验基地，走访用人单位，整合需求信息和岗位信息；重点抓好“六个一批 ” ， 即拓宽事业单位招录一批，拓宽国有企业招聘一批，拓宽基层项目招募一批，拓宽应征入伍一批，拓宽就业见习留用一批，拓宽创业带动就业一批；实行“一生一策”动态管理，为每位毕业生推荐不少于5个岗位信息，确保有就业意愿的困难家庭毕业生100%实现帮扶等。
test: According to the reporter, Beijing Municipal Human Resources and Social Security Bureau will build a practice platform, increase the supply of jobs, actively contact 40 universities and colleges graduates career experience base, visit employers, integrate demand information and job information; focus on the "six batches", namely, expand the recruitment of public institutions, expand the recruitment of state-owned enterprises, expand the recruitment of grassroots projects, expand the recruitment of military service, expand the employment of internship and use, expand the employment of entrepreneurship and entrepreneurship; implement "one strategy for life" dynamic management, recommend no less than 5 job information for each graduate, and ensure that 100% of graduates with employment willingness from difficult families are assisted.

src: 新华社南昌５月２２日电（记者陈毓珊）记者近日从江西省教育厅获悉，为增强紧缺学科教师队伍保障能力，实现乡村义务教育均衡发展，自２０１６年起，江西省规划用３年时间为全省乡村（乡镇及以下）每所小学培训合格的音乐、美术、体育教师各１名，共计１万名。

English: The wife,children,and siblings of Zheng Mingwen,accompanied by the relevant people-in-charge from China Railway No.14 Subsidiary Company and the local government also rushed to Nanchang on the 14th.

src: 据了解，这次培训对象为江西全省乡村小学４５岁以下具有音乐、美术、体育学科知识基础或才能，能兼任音乐、美术、体育课程的其他学科教师。

English: The art festival mainly includes a grand opening ceremony and closing ceremony,large scale theatrical performances with various characteristics,and paintings and photographic exhibitions.

src: 通过培训，使他们掌握音体美学科教学的基本知识和教学技能，更新教学思想和观念，掌握现代教学方法，提高学科教学能力、活动设计能力、校园文化能力及自我发展能力，建设一支一专多能的音体美教师队伍，缓解乡村音体美教师缺乏的问题。
test: Through training, they master the basic knowledge and teaching skills of aesthetic education, update their teaching ideas and concepts, master modern teaching methods, improve their teaching ability, activity design ability, campus cultural ability and self-development ability, and build a team of aesthetic education teachers with one specialty and multiple skills. , alleviate the problem of lack of rural aesthetic education teachers.

src: 从每年攀升的PMP（国际认证的项目管理专业人士资格）报名人数来看，越来越多的项目管理从业人员通过学习来提升自己的项目管理能力。
test: From the increasing number of PMP (Project Management Professional) applicants each year, it is clear that more and more project management professionals are learning to improve their project management skills.

src: 据《中国项目管理二十年发展报告(1999-2019)》称：截止到2019年9月，全国累计PMP®报考人数近60万人次，通过PMP®认证人数约42万人，有效持证人数约30万人, 占全球PMP®持证总量的31.2%。
test: According to the "20 Years of Development Report of Chinese Project Management (1999-2019)", as of September 2019, the number of PMP® applicants in China has reached nearly 600,000, the number of PMP® certified people has reached about 420,000, and the number of valid certificates has reached about 300,000, accounting for 31.2% of the total number of PMP® certificates worldwide.

src: 近10年PMP持证人数逐年递增，这说明越来越多的项目管理者意识到：靠简单照搬以往“老经验”来做事已不可取，瞬息万变的工作环境让我们知道一个要学会，站在科学巨人的肩膀上去探索前行的道路。

test: The number of PMP holders has been increasing year by year in the past 10 years, which means more and more project managers realize that it is no longer acceptable to simply copy the old experience to do things. The rapidly changing work environment tells us that we need to learn how to stand on the shoulders of giants to explore the road ahead.

src: 然而，考了PMP就能保证项目管理工作畅通无阻了吗？

src: 很多项目管理初学者表示，通过学习PMP/IPMP等相关课程，可以系统性地掌握项目管理的十大领域和五大过程组等相关知识点，但真正进行项目管理工作的时候却还是一头雾水。

src: 很多项目经理常常反馈以下问题： 项目管理认知不到位，单纯依靠个人经验，空有项目管理理论，不知如何实践； 缺乏系统的项目管理流程制度支撑，工作中无法落地，项目预估不准，把控度灵敏度差，项目一拖再拖； 成员分工不明确、团队中的“老油条”不知如何应对 跨部门协助沟通不顺畅，项目难以推进 ……

Does the self-proclaimed material girl really have faith in the traditional ancient Jewish mysticism or is this simply the latest fashion of self-help for celebrities.

src: 新华社华盛顿５月２３日电（记者徐剑梅）美国１３０多个亚裔团体２３日向美国教育部和司法部提交申诉，抗议３所常春藤名校 — — 耶鲁大学、布朗大学和达特茅斯学院在招生过程中歧视亚裔申请学生。
prompt:

test: WASHINGTON, May 23 (Xinhua) -- More than 130 Asian American organizations on Monday filed a complaint with the U.S. Department of Education and the Department of Justice, protesting against the alleged discrimination against Asian American applicants by three Ivy League universities -- Yale University, Brown University and Dartmouth College.

src: 牵头发起申诉的亚裔教育联盟当天在华盛顿召开新闻发布会。
test: The Asian American Education Coalition, which spearheaded the complaint, held a news conference in Washington on Tuesday.

src: 该团体主席赵宇空在发布会上说，过去１０年里，符合美国名校录取条件的亚裔申请人数量成倍增长，但在这３所美国名校中，亚裔所占比例基本维持在同一水平。
test: The president of the group, Zhao Yu Kong, said at the news conference that the number of Asian applicants who meet the admission requirements of top U.S. universities has grown exponentially over the past 10 years, but the percentage of Asians at the three universities has remained basically the same.

src: 许多研究表明，这些高校在所谓“综合考量”的招生过程中 ， “ 长期持续性以及系统化地歧视亚裔申请学生 ” 。
test: Many studies have shown that these universities have “systematically and continuously discriminated against Asian applicants” in the so-called “holistic review” process.

src: 赵宇空介绍说，２０１４年桑德斯等学者的研究显示，在这３所高校里，相对申请者人数，亚裔在所有族裔中录取率最低。
prompt:
Translate Chinese to English:
Chinese: (法新社雅加达电)东协能源部长今天在印尼渡假胜地岜里岛集会，为大规模区域天然气管计划拟定一项行动计划。
English: (AFP,Jakarta)ASEAN energy ministers met today in Bali,a resort island in Indonesia,to propose an action plan for a large-scale regional gas pipeline project.
test: Zhao Yujun said that in 2014, a study by Sanders et al. showed that among all ethnic groups, Asian applicants had the lowest acceptance rate relative to the number of applicants at these three universities.

src: 美国教育部的数据也显示，在所有常春藤盟校中，布朗大学和达特茅斯学院对亚裔学生的录取比例最低，耶鲁大学和布朗大学对亚裔申请学生实施了事实上的种族配额达２０年以上。
test: The data from the U.S. Department of Education also shows that Brown University and Dartmouth College have the lowest acceptance rates for Asian students among all Ivy League schools, and Yale University and Brown University have implemented de facto racial quotas for Asian applicants for over 20 years.

src: 赵宇空告诉新华社记者，他们期望提交申诉后，美国教育部、司法部能够展开调查，并在认定事实后采取措施阻止这些高校继续在招生中歧视亚裔。
test: Zhao YuKong told Xinhua News Agency reporters that they hope that after submitting the appeal, the U.S. Department of Education and the Department of Justice will launch an investigation and take measures to prevent these schools from discriminating against Asians in recruitment after determining the facts.

src: 他们也期望被投诉高校能够主动重视这一问题，改变对亚裔的招生政策。
test: They also hope that the universities will actively pay attention to this problem and change their admission policies for Asian students.

src: 目前，被投诉的３所高校尚未作出回应。
test: The three universities have not responded to the complaints.

src: 亚裔教育联盟成立于２０１５年，当时曾投诉哈佛大学招生歧视，但美国教育部以程序理由未予受理。
test: The Asian American Education Coalition was founded in 2015, when it complained that Harvard University discriminated against applicants, but the U.S. Department of Education did not accept it for procedural reasons.

src: 21日、22日两日，北京市初中入学特长生考查工作由各区教委统一组织实施。
test: The special examination for the admission of junior high school students with special talents in Beijing will be organized by the municipal education commissions of the districts.

src: 今年，北京各区均压缩了特长生招生比例，特长生竞争更为激烈。
test: This year, the proportion of gifted students in each district of Beijing has been reduced, and the competition for gifted students is more intense.

src: 以东城区为例，今年该区小学升初中特长生入学比例总体不超过全区招生计划数的5 % ， 计划招生人数为380人，到校比例不超过学校招生计划数的10 % 。
test: For example, in the eastern district, the proportion of primary school students who are admitted to junior high school as gifted students is not more than 5% of the total number of students admitted in the district this year. The number of students admitted is 380, and the proportion of students admitted to the school is not more than 10% of the total number of students admitted to the school.

src: 波黑奥委会主席：坚信中国有能力在特殊时期办好冬奥盛会-新华网
test: Chinese: 波黑奥委会主席：坚信中国有能力在特殊时期办好冬奥盛会-新华网

src: 新华社萨拉热窝12月11日电 波黑奥委会主席克韦西奇近日表示，波方十分期待北京冬奥会，坚信中国有能力在特殊时期办好冬奥盛会。
test: Sarajevo, Dec. 11 (Xinhua) -- The president of the Olympic Committee of Bosnia and Herzegovina (BOHOC) said on Monday that the country is looking forward to the Beijing Winter Olympics and is confident that China will be able to host the Games successfully in the special period.

src: 日前中国驻波黑大使季平在萨拉热窝奥林匹克中心会见波黑奥委会主席克韦西奇。
test: Chinese Ambassador to Bosnia and Herzegovina QI Ping met with the President of the Olympic Committee of Bosnia and Herzegovina, Zeljko Kvesic, at the Olympic Center in Sarajevo recently.

src: 会见时，克韦西奇积极评价波中关系并表示，他曾于2008年北京夏奥会之际访华，对中方出色的组织工作印象极为深刻，坚信中国有能力在特殊时期办好冬奥盛会；波方十分期待北京冬奥会，波黑奥委会正在积极组织参会；波方希望以此为契机，同中方在体育领域开展更为广泛的交流合作。
test: During the meeting, Kvesic expressed his positive evaluation of the China-Bosnia and Herzegovina relations and said that he had visited China during the 2008 Beijing Olympic Games and was deeply impressed by the excellent organization of the Chinese side. He believed that China would be able to host the Winter Olympics well in special times. Bosnia and Herzegovina is looking forward to the Beijing Winter Olympics. The Bosnia and Herzegovina National Olympic Committee is actively organizing the participation. Bosnia and Herzegovina hopes to take this opportunity to carry out more extensive exchanges and cooperation with China in the field of sports.

src: 季平表示，中波两国有着特殊的“奥运纽带 ” 。
test: Qipeng said that the two countries have a special "Olympic bond".

src: 1984年萨拉热窝冬奥会在这里成功举办，再过两个月，2022年北京冬奥会也将拉开帷幕，将向世界呈现一场简约、安全、精彩的盛会。
test: The 1984 Winter Olympics in Sarajevo were successfully held here. In two months, the 2022 Beijing Winter Olympics will also open, which will present a simple, safe and wonderful event to the world.

src: 期待两国在冬季体育赛事筹备、运动员训练等方面深化交流合作，中国驻波黑使馆愿继续发挥桥梁作用，以北京冬奥会为契机，推动两国人文交流不断深化，让两国人民“一起向未来 ” ， 并祝波黑运动健儿在北京取得佳绩。
test: We look forward to deepening exchanges and cooperation between the two countries in the preparation of winter sports events and the training of athletes. The Chinese Embassy in Bosnia and Herzegovina will continue to play a bridge role and promote the deepening of cultural exchanges between the two countries with the Beijing Winter Olympics as an opportunity, so that the people of the two countries can “go together towards the future”, and wish the athletes of Bosnia and Herzegovina to achieve good results in Beijing.

src: 会见前，波黑奥委会举办了“第十届年度最佳运动员”颁奖典礼，季平作为特邀嘉宾为波黑最佳青年运动员颁奖。

src: 新华社北京12月11日电（记者董瑞丰、顾天成）国务院联防联控机制日前印发关于加强口岸城市新冠肺炎疫情防控工作的通知，要求近期离开陆地边境口岸城市（与香港、澳门有口岸相连的除外）人员需持有48小时内核酸检测阴性证明，前往陆地边境口岸城市人员抵达后至少进行1次核酸检测。
test: BEIJING, Dec. 11 (Xinhua) -- The State Council Joint Prevention and Control Mechanism has issued a notice on strengthening COVID-19 prevention and control work at land ports, requiring people who have left land port cities in the recent 48 hours (excluding those with land ports connected to Hong Kong and Macao) to provide a negative nucleic acid test result within 48 hours before entering land port cities, and those who have arrived at land port cities to undergo at least one nucleic acid test.

src: 根据通知，上述要求的时间范围为，从各省区市确定口岸城市范围并公告之日起，至2022年3月15日。
test: According to the notice, the time range for the above requirements is from the date when each province, autonomous region and municipality determines the port city range and announces it to March 15, 2022.

src: 此外，通知还提出，有条件的口岸城市可研究在辖区内设置疫情防控缓冲区。
test: In addition, the notice also proposes that cities with conditions can study the establishment of epidemic prevention buffer zones in their jurisdiction.

src: 国家卫生健康委疾病预防控制局有关负责人介绍，对于一些口岸城市来说，跨境边贸是当地主要经济支柱，双方边民往来频繁。
test: The relevant person in charge of the National Health Commission's Disease Prevention and Control Bureau introduced that for some port cities, cross-border border trade is the main economic pillar of the local area, and the border residents go back and forth frequently.

src: 实行分区差异化管理政策，由一道防控外溢防线变为两道防线，有望实现关口前移，压缩疫情外溢风险，以最小社会影响、最低社会成本实现疫情防控最大成效。
test: Implementing differentiated management policies in different areas, from one line of defense against external leakage to two lines of defense, is expected to achieve the goal of moving the front line of defense, compressing the risk of external leakage of the epidemic, and achieving the maximum effect of epidemic prevention and control with the least social impact and the lowest social cost.

src: 近期我国发生多起本土聚集性疫情，均是境外疫情经口岸城市输入。

src: 新华社西宁12月11日电（记者骆晓飞、张宏祥）记者从青海省农业农村厅获悉，最新监测结果显示，青海湖裸鲤资源蕴藏量今年较上年增加0.71万吨,达到10.85万吨，与2002年保护初期相比，累计增长40余倍。
test: Xinhua News Agency Xining December 11 (Reporter Luo Xiao Fei, Zhang Hong Xiang) reporters from the Qinghai Provincial Department of Agriculture and Rural Areas learned that the latest monitoring results show that Qinghai Lake naked carp resources reserves this year than last year increased by 0.71 million tons, up to 10.85 million tons, compared with the initial protection in 2002, cumulative growth of more than 40 times.

src: 青海湖裸鲤俗名“湟鱼 ” ， 是青海湖中特有的珍贵鱼种，对维系青海湖流域“水-鱼-鸟”生态链安全和生物多样性有着举足轻重的作用。
prompt:
Translate Chinese to English:

English: From the photographs provided by the Institute of Optics and Fine Mechanics,this winding capillary connected the fish 's air bladder with its head.
test: Qinghai Lake is the largest inland saltwater lake in China. It is also the largest lake in the country that is located at an altitude of over 3,000 meters. The lake is located in the Qinghai-Tibet Plateau, which is the world’s largest and highest plateau. The lake is surrounded by mountains and is a popular tourist destination. The lake is home to many species of birds, including the endangered black-necked crane. The lake is also home to the Qinghai Lake fish, which is a rare species of fish that is only found in the lake. The lake is an important source of water for the local people and is also used for irrigation and fishing.

src: 20世纪六七十年代，受人为大量捕杀、裸鲤繁殖水域环境日益退化等因素影响，青海湖裸鲤数量锐减，2002年青海湖裸鲤资源蕴藏量仅为2592吨。
test: In the 1960s and 1970s, the population of naked carp in Qinghai Lake was greatly reduced due to human overfishing, the degradation of the breeding environment, and other factors. By 2002, the total amount of naked carp in Qinghai Lake was only 2,592 tons.

src: 2004年在《中国物种红色名录》中青海湖裸鲤被列为濒危物种。
test: The Qinghai Lake blindfish was listed as an endangered species in the 2004 Red List of Chinese Species.

src: 从2003年起，青海省实施封湖育鱼，禁止任何单位、集体和个人到青海湖及湖区主要河流及支流捕捞裸鲤，禁止销售裸鲤及其制品。
prompt:

test: Since 2003, Qinghai Province has implemented the ban on fishing in Qinghai Lake and its main tributaries, and prohibited the sale of naked carp and its products.

src: 与此同时，通过人工增殖放流以及清理青海湖主要入湖河流河道、设计科学合理的“过鱼通道”等措施持续加大保护力度，青海湖裸鲤资源蕴藏量逐年增加。
test: At the same time, the protection measures such as artificial propagation and release, cleaning the main rivers flowing into Qinghai Lake, and designing scientific and reasonable "fishways" have been continuously strengthened, and the resource reserves of Qinghai Lake naked carp have been increasing year by year.

src: 青海省农业农村厅副厅长杨林介绍，截至目前，青海湖裸鲤已累计实施人工增殖放流近1.8亿尾，对青海湖裸鲤资源恢复的贡献率超过23 % 。

src: 青海三江源地区是我国乃至亚洲重要的生态屏障和水源涵养区，而青海湖是控制西部荒漠化向东蔓延的天然屏障和生态功能区。
test: The Sanjiangyuan region in Qinghai is an important ecological barrier and water source conservation area in China and even in Asia, while Qinghai Lake is a natural barrier and ecological function zone to control the expansion of the desert in the west to the east.

src: 为了保护三江源地区和青海湖水域生态环境、保护水生野生动物，维护青藏高原生物多样性，今年以来，青海先后发布长江、黄河、青海湖重点水域禁捕通告，构建起了“一江一河一湖”全面禁捕管理体系。

src: 中文译名“形而上学”取自《易经•系辞上传》“形而上者谓之道，形而下者谓之器”一语，为日本人井上哲次郎（明治时代）由metaphysic翻译而来。

src: 云南：统筹规范乡村公益性岗位管理-新华网
test: Yunnan: Coordinating and standardizing the management of rural public welfare posts

src: 新华社昆明12月12日电（记者林碧锋）为持续做好脱贫人口就业帮扶，巩固拓展脱贫攻坚成果，云南省日前出台促进乡村振兴乡村公益性岗位管理相关政策，助力全面推进乡村振兴。
test: Xinhua News Agency, Kunming, December 12 (Reporter Lin Bifeng) In order to continue to do a good job in helping the poor population to find jobs, consolidate and expand the achievements of poverty alleviation, Yunnan Province recently issued a series of policies to promote the management of public welfare posts in rural areas, and help to comprehensively promote rural revitalization.

src: 云南省人社厅有关负责人介绍，目前，云南共开发44.83万个乡村公益性岗位，用于安置脱贫劳动力等农村困难群体就业，在帮助脱贫群众实现就业增收、巩固脱贫攻坚成果、有效提升乡村各项公共服务能力等方面发挥重要作用。
test: According to the relevant person in charge of the Yunnan Provincial Department of Human Resources and Social Security, at present, Yunnan has developed 448,300 rural public welfare positions, which are used to provide employment for the labor force and other difficult groups in rural areas. They play an important role in helping the poor to achieve employment and income increase, consolidating the achievements of poverty alleviation and effectively improving the level of rural public services.

src: 此次新规由云南人社、乡村振兴、财政等七部门联合印发，主要对基层招聘乡村公益性岗位人员的对象范围、资金管理、岗位开发、岗位管理等方面进行统一规范。
test: This time, the new rules were jointly issued by the Yunnan Department of Human Resources and Social Security, the Department of Rural Revitalization, and the Department of Finance. It mainly unifies the scope of objects, fund management, post development, and post management in the recruitment of rural public welfare posts at the grassroots level.

src: 在岗位开发设置方面，新规明确，按照“按需设岗、以岗定人、动态管理、总量控制 ” “ 谁开发、谁使用、谁负责”及“一人一岗、自愿公开、统一管理”的原则进行设置。
test: In terms of post development, the new rules clearly state that posts should be developed according to the principle of “developing posts as needed, assigning people to posts, dynamically managing posts, and controlling the total number of posts” and the principle of “who develops posts, who uses posts, and who is responsible for posts” and the principle of “one person, one post, voluntary publicity, and unified management”.

src: 招聘程序必须按照公告、申报、审核、公示、聘用、岗前培训及安排上岗等步骤进行。
test: The recruitment process must be carried out in accordance with the announcement, application, review, publicity, employment, pre-job training and arrangement of on-the-job.

src: 此外，新规还明确了乡村公益性岗位主要开发部门的具体职责、乡村公益性岗位的补贴标准和补贴方式，规定各乡村公益性岗位开发部门应为乡村公益性岗位安置人员购买意外伤害商业保险；要求有关部门定期对乡村公益性岗位补贴发放情况进行监督。
test: In addition, the new rules clearly defined the specific responsibilities of the main departments for the development of rural public welfare posts, the subsidy standards and methods of rural public welfare posts, and stipulated that the departments for the development of rural public welfare posts should purchase commercial insurance for the rural public welfare posts. The placement personnel; require relevant departments to supervise the issuance of rural public welfare post subsidies on a regular basis.

src: 之所以在大屏市场有如此好的成绩，主要归功于激光电视在护眼方面的出色表现。

src: 越南人民报网 - 越南政府总理范明正出席第三次越南国家数字技术企业发展论坛
test: Vietnam News Agency - Prime Minister Pham Minh Chinh attends the 3rd Vietnam National Forum on Digital Technology Enterprises Development

src: 第三次越南国家数字技术企业发展论坛期间举行两场主要会议，讨论议题围绕着数字技术企业与国家数字化转型、数字技术企业与新冠肺炎疫情中和疫情后经济复苏与发展两大主题。
test: During the 3rd National Digital Technology Enterprise Development Forum, two main meetings were held, discussing topics around digital technology enterprises and national digital transformation, digital technology enterprises and the containment and post-epidemic economic recovery and development of the new crown pneumonia epidemic.

src: 通信传媒部部长阮孟雄表示，2021年，尽管新冠肺炎疫情持续蔓延，但越南数字技术企业的数量和营业收入仍保持增长势头，达近10 % 。
test: Nguyen Manh Hung, Minister of Information and Communications, said that despite the COVID-19 pandemic, the number and revenue of digital technology enterprises in Vietnam in 2021 still maintained a growth trend, reaching nearly 10 % .

src: 2021年，越南典型数字产品数量耕作，集中解决越南面临的各大难题，许多数字产品已走出国门，越南数字技术排名已提升。
prompt:
Translate Chinese to English:
Chinese: 为减少农民耕作对生态环境的破坏，决定将１０万农村移民迁出库区易地安置。
English: To reduce the damage to the ecology caused by peasants ' farming,Chongqing has decided to resettle 100,000 rural residents from the Three Gorges reservoir region to other localities.
test: In 2021, typical digital products in Vietnam were cultivated, concentrated on solving the major problems that Vietnam is facing, many digital products have gone out of the country, and Vietnam's digital technology ranking has been improved.

src: 阮孟雄部长呼吁数字技术企业负起发展国家数字化转型平台的责任，担当发展这些国家数字平台的任务就是担当国家使命。
test: Minister of Communications and Information, Mr Josephine Teo, called on digital technology companies to take on the responsibility of developing national digital platforms for the country’s digital transformation. Developing these national digital platforms is a national mission.

src: 在论坛上，各部门和国家机关领导，正在研究、发展、应用、转让数字技术的企业、组织和个人分享了动员和汇集全社会资源来发展越南技术企业，携手推动国家数字化转型，朱慧疫情后经济复苏等的各突破性设想和解决方案。
test: At the forum, leaders of departments and state agencies, enterprises, organizations and individuals that are researching, developing, applying and transferring digital technology shared their breakthrough ideas and solutions for mobilizing and pooling resources from the whole society to develop Vietnamese digital technology enterprises, working together to promote the country's digital transformation, and overcoming the economic recovery after the epidemic.

src: 范明正总理在论坛上发表讲话时强调，数字化转型是世界必由之路，是发展的客观需求。
test: Prime Minister Pham Minh Chinh stressed that digital transformation is the only way forward for the world and a demand of development in his remarks at the forum.

src: 数字化转型已成为全球性问题，数字化转型服务全民，因此需动员全民参与。
test: Digital transformation has become a global issue, and digital transformation services are for the people, so we need to mobilize the whole people to participate.

src: 人民和企业是数字化转型的核心、主体、目标和动力。
test: People and enterprises are the core, main body, goal and driving force of digital transformation.

src: 因此，一切政策需为了人民和企业。
test: Therefore, all policies must be for the people and enterprises.

src: 范明正总理强调，数字化转型需体现民族精神，需以内力为主、战略、长期和决定性因素，外力为重要和突破口。
test: Premier Li Keqiang stressed that the digital transformation should be based on the spirit of the Chinese nation, with the internal force as the mainstay, the strategic, long-term and decisive factor, and the external force as the important and breakthrough point.

src: 他同时认为，数字化转型需驱动向纵深发展和可持续发展，参与新冠肺炎疫情防控、经济复苏和发展、应对其后变化、克服自然资源枯竭现象，助力绿色转型、发展绿色能源。
test: He also believes that digital transformation should drive the deepening and sustainable development, participate in the prevention and control of the new crown pneumonia epidemic, economic recovery and development, cope with the changes that follow, overcome the phenomenon of depletion of natural resources, and help green transformation and development of green energy.

src: 数字化转型需参与保护和弘扬有关国家文化价值、历史传统、国家风土人情等的数据库建立工作，推动银行、税务、土地管理和开发数据库以及物流等领域数字化转型。
test: The digital transformation of the financial sector requires the establishment of databases that protect and promote the cultural values, historical traditions, and national customs of the country, and the digital transformation of the banking, tax, land management and development, and logistics sectors.

src: 数字化转型的最大目标是让人民更幸福，国家日益繁荣发展。
test: The ultimate goal of digital transformation is to make people happier and the country more prosperous.

src: 范明正总理要求各级政府、各级机关和企业在发展数字技术中需加大领导和指导力度，提高对数字化转型的认识，继续制定和完善关于数字化转型的体制，加强国家管理度和本着尊重、沟通、倾听、积极和主动的精神上推动对数字技术企业发展。
test: Premier Li Keqiang called on all levels of government, departments and enterprises to step up leadership and guidance in the development of digital technology, improve their understanding of digital transformation, continue to formulate and improve the system for digital transformation, strengthen national management and promote the development of digital technology enterprises in a spirit of respect, communication, listening, positive and active.

src: 论坛期间，范明正总理出席了2021年“越南制造”优秀数字产品奖颁奖仪式及“越南制造”数字产品展开幕式。
test: During the forum, Prime Minister Pham Minh Chinh attended the award ceremony and opening ceremony of the “Made in Vietnam” digital product exhibition.

src: 第十七条 国家对注册消防工程师资格实行注册执业管理制度。
test: Article 17 The State shall implement a registration and practice management system for registered fire protection engineers.

src: 取得一级、二级注册消防工程师资格证书的人员，经注册方可以相应级别注册消防工程师名义执业。
test: Those who have obtained the first-level or second-level registered fire engineer qualification certificate can be registered as a registered fire engineer of the corresponding level by the registration authority.

src: 第十八条 公安部消防局是一级注册消防工程师资格的注册审批部门。
test: The Public Security Department of the Ministry of Public Security is the registration approval department for the registration of first-class registered fire engineers.

src: 省、自治区、直辖市公安机关消防机构为二级注册消防工程师资格的注册审批部门，并负责一级注册消防工程师资格注册的初步审查工作。
test: The public security organs of the provinces, autonomous regions and municipalities directly under the Central Government are the registration approval departments for the second-level registered fire protection engineers, and are responsible for the preliminary review of the registration of the first-level registered fire protection engineers.

src: 第十九条 取得一级、二级注册消防工程师资格证书并申请注册的人员，应当受聘于一个经批准的消防技术服务机构或者消防安全重点单位，并通过聘用单位向本单位所在地(聘用单位属企业的，通过本企业向工商注册所在地)的公安机关消防机构提交注册申请材料。
test: Article 19: Those who have obtained the qualification certificates of first-class or second-class registered fire protection engineers and apply for registration shall be employed by a fire protection technical service institution or a fire safety key unit approved by the public security fire brigade at the place of registration (if the employer is an enterprise, through the enterprise to the registration place of the business registration) and submit the registration application materials through the employer.

src: 第二十条 省、自治区、直辖市公安机关消防机构在收到申请人的注册申请材料后，对申请材料不齐全或者不符合法定形式的，应当当场或者在5个工作日内，一次 性告知申请人需要补正的全部内容，逾期不告知的，自收到申请材料之日起即为受理。
test: Article 22 Where the public security organs of the provinces, autonomous regions and municipalities directly under the Central Government receive the registration application materials of the applicant, if the application materials are incomplete or do not conform to the legal form, they shall inform the applicant of the contents to be supplemented in person or within 5 working days, and shall not inform the applicant of the contents to be supplemented within the prescribed time limit. After the receipt of the application materials, it shall be deemed to have been registered.

src: 对受理或者不予受理的注册申请，均应当出具加盖本级公安机关消防机构专用印章和注明日期的书面凭证。
prompt:
Translate Chinese to English:
Chinese: 其中最为特别的是,“洪宪”二字上又加盖了红字印鉴的“中华民国”。
English: What is most particular is that a red seal that reads Republic of China was put on top of the two characters of Hongxian .
test: The public security organ at the same level shall issue a written receipt with the special seal of the fire control department of the public security organ and the date marked thereon for the registration application that is accepted or not accepted.

src: 第二十一条 省、自治区、直辖市公安机关消防机构自受理注册申请之日起20个工作日内，按规定条件和程序完成一级注册消防工程师资格注册申请材料的初步审查工作和二级注册消防工程师资格的注册审批工作，并将一级注册消防工程师资格注册申请材料和初步审查意见报公安部消防局审批。
test: The public security organs of the provinces, autonomous regions and municipalities directly under the Central Government shall, within 20 working days from the date of receipt of the application for registration of the first-level registered fire engineer qualification, complete the preliminary review of the application materials for registration of the first-level registered fire engineer qualification and the approval of the second-level registered fire engineer qualification in accordance with the prescribed conditions and procedures, and report the application materials for registration of the first-level registered fire engineer qualification and the preliminary review opinions to the Ministry of Public Security for approval.

src: 公安部消防局应当自收到省级公安机关消防机构报送的申请材料和初步审查意见之日起，20个工作日内作出是否批准的决定。
test: The public security fire department shall make a decision on whether to approve the application within 20 working days from the date of receipt of the application materials and preliminary review opinions submitted by the provincial public security fire department.

src: 在规定的期限内不能作出批准决定的，应当将延长的期限和理由告知申请人。
test: If the decision cannot be made within the prescribed period, the extension of the period and the reasons therefor shall be notified to the applicant.

src: 对作出不予批准决定的，应当书面说明理由，并告知申请人享有依法申请行政复议或者提起行政诉讼的权利。

src: 第二十二条 注册审批部门应当自作出批准决定之日起10个工作日内，颁发、送达相应级别的注册证。

src: 第二十三条 注册证的每一注册有效期为3年。

src: 注册证在有效期内是相应级别注册消防工程师的执业凭证，由注册消防工程师本人保管、使用。

src: 第二十四条 申请初始注册的，应当自取得一级、二级注册消防工程师资格证书之日起1年内提出申请。
test: Article 24: An applicant for initial registration shall submit an application within one year from the date of obtaining the first-level or second-level registered fire protection engineer qualification certificate.

src: 逾期申请初始注册时，须符合本规定继续教育要求。
test: When applying for initial registration after the expiry of the registration period, the applicant must meet the continuing education requirements of this Regulation.

src: 初始注册、延续注册、变更注册、注销注册和不予注册等注册管理的具体办法，由公安部另行规定。
test: The specific measures for the registration management of initial registration, renewal of registration, change of registration, cancellation of registration and refusal of registration shall be prescribed by the Ministry of Public Security.

src: 第二十五条 继续教育是注册消防工程师延续注册、重新注册和逾期初始注册的必备条件。
test: Article 25 Continuing education is a prerequisite for registered fire protection engineers to continue their registration, re-registration, and late initial registration.

src: 在每个注册有效期内，各级别注册消防工程师应当按照规定完成相应的继续教育。
test: During the validity period of each level of registration, registered fire protection engineers shall complete the corresponding continuing education as required.

src: 第二十六条 注册审批部门应当及时向社会公告注册消防工程师注册有关情况，建立注册消防工程师诚信档案，对其执业活动实行信用管理。
test: Article 26: The registration authority shall promptly announce to the public the registration of fire protection engineers and the relevant information, establish a credit file for the fire protection engineers, and implement credit management on their professional activities.

src: 第二十七条 各级注册消防工程师资格的注册管理部门，应当严格执行《中华人民共和国行政许可法》有关规定。
test: The registration management departments of the registered fire protection engineer qualification at all levels shall strictly implement the relevant provisions of the "Administrative Licensing Law of the People's Republic of China".

src: 演习成果得到中越两军的肯定。
test: The results of the exercise were affirmed by both Chinese and Vietnamese armies.

src: 越方演习指导委员会主任、越南人民军后勤总局副主任兼参谋长阮雄胜在演习结束仪式上说，通过此次演习，越南军医从中国军医身上学到了演习组织及专业活动方面的知识，也见识了中方的医疗、保障设备。
prompt:
Translate Chinese to English:
Chinese: 改革开放使人们的眼界开阔、见识增加、思想活跃，也学会了比较和鉴别。
English: The reform and opening up has enabled people to widen their field of vision,enrich their experiences,activate their thinking,and learn how to make comparison and differentiation.
test: At the closing ceremony of the exercise, the Director of the Steering Committee for the Exercise, Deputy Director and Chief of Staff of the General Logistics Department of the Vietnam People’s Army, Nguyen Hung Viet, said that through the exercise, Vietnamese military medical personnel had learned knowledge about the organization and professional activities of the exercise, and had seen the medical and logistical equipment of the Chinese side.

src: 演习取得的成果证明了两国军医力量在医疗援助、疫情防控方面的专业能力。
test: The results of the joint exercise have proved the professional capabilities of the two countries' medical forces in medical assistance and epidemic prevention and control.

src: 中方指导协调组组长、中央军委后勤保障部卫生局副局长陈春明表示，此次演习是在2018年成功举办联合义诊活动的基础上又一次开拓创新实践，具有非常重要的里程碑意义。
prompt:
Translate Chinese to English:
Chinese: 一声令下，第十六组组长贾健辉身背行囊和特种器械，带领队员像爬墙虎一样紧贴绝壁快速向顶峰攀去。
English: No sooner had Jia Jianhui,leader of the 16th special assault group,issued an order than he led his group members,carrying both a traveling bag and some special equipment with them,to rapidly climb up to the top of the steep cliff just as a wall-climbing expert would.
test: The head of the Chinese delegation and deputy director of the Logistics Support Department of the Central Military Commission, Chen Chunming, said that this exercise was another innovative practice based on the successful joint medical activities in 2018, and had great significance as a milestone.

src: 演习期间，中国人民解放军向越南人民军捐赠了医用防护口罩、医用防护服、快速核酸检测仪器等卫生防疫物资。
test: During the exercise, the Chinese People's Liberation Army donated medical protective masks, medical protective clothing, rapid nucleic acid detection instruments and other medical and health materials to the Vietnam People's Army.
